name: Cube Crisis
description:
Cube Crisis, a casual single-player game that tests hand-eye coordination, needs SUPER control ability to avoid blocks which are moving faster and faster.
The game provides 4 different levels of difficulty.

Press the button you set to avoid the blocks.

You may either choose to play in the Scene or break records through competitive missions!

Since the game is still under development, what shows in the screenshots may not be the same as those in the final edition.
